messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The HoS is not cool, he is very rude

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Cool Station for coolios, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Cool Station for coolios's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of rodents have descended into the maintenance areas.
